forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies this morning will become partly cloudy this afternoon. High 14C. Winds NNW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies this morning will become partly cloudy this afternoon. High 58F. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 9C. N winds at 15 to 30 km/h, decreasing to 5 to 10 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds. Low 48F. N winds at 10 to 20 mph, decreasing to less than 5 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High around 15C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 59F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low near 10C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to considerable cloudiness and fog after midnight. Low near 50F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 14C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 58F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low around 10C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to considerable cloudiness and fog after midnight. Low near 50F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 17C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 62F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 13C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low near 55F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High near 15C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 59F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 11C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 51F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 56F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low near 10C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 49F. W winds shifting to SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 14C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low near 10C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 49F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High around 15C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 59F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies early will give way to low clouds and fog after midnight. Low around 10C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies early will give way to low clouds and fog after midnight. Low 49F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 16C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High around 60F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early, then becoming foggy and damp later at night. Low 11C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low 51F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny. High 16C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 61F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 11C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 51F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.
